title: How many albums has BTS released? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are the list of all of their album releases [ Note : I am gonna include the Japanese albums ] . BTS’s debut album : 2 cool 4 skool [ Release date : June 13 , 2013 ] . First mini album ( EP ) : O!RUL8,2? [ release date : 11th September , 2013 ] . second mini album ( EP ) : Skool luv affair [ release date : 12 Feb , 2014 ] . First Repackage album : Skool luv affair special addition [ release date : 14th May , 2014 ] . First studio album : Dark and wild [ release date : 19th August , 2014 ] . First Japanese studio album : Wake up [ release date : 24th December , 2014 ] . Third mini album ( EP ) : 화양연화 ( The most beautiful moment in life pt 1 ) [ release date : 29th April , 2015 ] . Fourth mini album ( EP ) : 화양연화 ( The most beautiful moment in life pt 2 ) [ release date : 30th November , 2015 ] . First compilation album : The most beautiful moment in life : Young Forever [ release date : 2nd May , 2016 ] . Second Japanese studio album : Youth [ release date : 7th September , 2016 ] . second studio album : Wings [ release date : 10th October , 2016 ] . Second repackage album : You never walk Alone [ release date : 13th February , 2017 ] . fifth mini album ( EP ) : Love Yourself : Her [ release date : 18th September , 2017 ] . Third Japanese studio album : Face Yourself [ release date : 4th April 2018 ] . sixth album : Love Yourself : Tear [ release date : 18th May , 2018 ] . third repackage album : Love yourself : Answer [ release date : 24th August , 2018 ] . sixth mini album ( EP ) : Map of the soul : Persona [ release date : 12th April , 2019 ] . BTS World OST [ release date : 28th June , 2019 ] . studio album : Map of the soul : 7 [ release date : 21st February , 2020 ] . Japanese album : Map of the soul : The journey [ release date : 15th July , 2020 ] I hope this helped..bye..!!

BTS have released six studio albums (one of which was reissued under a different title), four compilation albums, five extended plays, and twenty-two singles. The group debuted in South Korea on June 13, 2013 with the single album 2 Cool 4 Skool. They made a comeback on September 2013 with an extended play, O! I googled it :D
